document_data.name: ''Goblin Totem''
document_data.creator: [[Goblins]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Goblin totems''''' were [[magical]] [[weapon]]s crafted by [[goblins]] out of the bones of powerful monsters.
document_data.Description: These weapons were generally crude. They were either fashioned or carved from bone, and had [[leather]] strips wrapped around the intended handle.
document_data.Powers: Wielding a ''goblin totem'' filled one with confidence that they could face enemies much larger than themselves, and the weapons were indeed were more deadly against larger opponents. Big hits also tended to hit a bit harder with a ''goblin totem''.
document_data.Notable Goblin Totems:
* The ''[[horn totem]]'' and ''[[skull totem]]'' were fashioned in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]] from the bones of an [[Oni mage|oni]] known as the [[Ogre King]] by his goblin worshipers.
* A ''goblin totem'' was in the possession of the [[Cloudrippers]] tribe in the [[Tannath Mountains]] of [[Aglarond]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Silver Lining|4,23}}
